Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Jeteye
Reviews.Content: 2200mAh?  I don't think so... Original battery from Canon (EOS-M)which is rated at 800mAh lasts 2 times longer than this battery.  If you need to shoot video, think twice before buying this.  If you only shoot photo, then this might be ok since it is very cheap compared to Canon battery.

Reviews.Title: BATTERIES THAT FILL THE BILL
Reviews.Author: Theodore Zborowski
Reviews.Content: They work like the original equipment and the price was right. Also prompt delivery. Waiting for a long shoot at my next reunion.

Reviews.Title: Just as expected.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: They don't last as long as the original batery, but for the price are just right.The EOS M drains the battery so fast that you MUST buy spare bateries.These are a good choice. I would recommend them.

Reviews.Title: nice high 2,200 mAh for a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Discoveror "Mike"
Reviews.Content: ... and they work ! ... just fine, thank you.  No problems, no issues.  Yes, I would buy them, again, in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: jim "book's spawn"
Reviews.Content: Got these two to supplement my EOS Rebel SL1...both work perfectly, hold a charge like the battery that came with my camera.  Definitely recommend this product, great price.

Reviews.Title: Good and Inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Jayebee
Reviews.Content: Without getting in to a long, technical review I will just say that these batteries have held up for several years in my cameras and always perform well.  I am impressed with their staying power and longevity and will continue to purchase these inexpensive  batteries for my cameras.

Reviews.Title: S***ty quality control
Reviews.Author: Can Ngo
Reviews.Content: One battery was dead. Can't return just one, needed to return both. Charger just keeps blinking and didn't charge my battery.

Reviews.Title: Seems to work great and price is superb
Reviews.Author: Robert T.
Reviews.Content: I received two batteries. I charged them both up and they both came to full charge - I used the charger that came with my camera. However when I put the first of the two batteries I received into the camera I noticed it was a rather tight fit. I could not use the ejector to pop the battery out, but rather had to use a small screw driver and a small pair of pliers to pull it out. It seemed to be slightly bigger than the original battery. I tried the second battery and it fit just fine. So I decided to sand the sides and back of the first battery down a bit and then it fit. My brother-in-law who is quite a camera buff told me that sometimes the batteries can expand if left on a charger too long. Perhaps I should have (and I would recommend) try installing the batteries before charging to make sure it came that way from the factory - and not something I may have done. If it would be true that I caused the battery to expand then I'd certainly give this a 5-star rating, but since I charged both batteries the same way and one worked and one didn't I guess I'll never know. Other than that, they work great!

Reviews.Title: Good batteries
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: They don't hold a charge as long my actual Canon battery, but as a set of backup batteries, they work well.

Reviews.Title: Nice packaging...
Reviews.Author: SKY
Reviews.Content: So far so good...  The package arrived nicely and they were quick to charge, less than an hour, so may be they were "pre-charged"?  Not sure.  I have not done a drain test w/ them yet, but so far they are working fine.  I will update the stars and my comments if I found them not performing to at least the OEM battery.

ProductInfo.Features:
Two LP-E12 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement 2200 mAh Battery
Battery meets or exceeds the original equipment manufacturers specifications
This Replacement Battery is 100% compatible with the Canon LP-E12 battery
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 18 MP CMOS DSLR Camera Two LP-E12 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery 2200 mAh Bundle DavisMAX SL1 Accessory Kit
